alert.note: Alert for Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:51AM EDT until June 27 at 2:30AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN WORCESTER...NORTH CENTRAL WASHINGTON...WESTERN KENT AND PROVIDENCE COUNTIES... At 151 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Greenwich, or near Coventry, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Cranston, Woonsocket, Coventry, Cumberland, Johnston, Smithfield, Lincoln, Killingly, Bellingham, Burrillville, Uxbridge, North Smithfield, Scituate, Glocester, Blackstone, Hopkinton, Richmond, Exeter, West Greenwich and Foster. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
